meanings.definition: A box for storing or transporting hats.
meanings.sent1: I bought two new hatboxes to keep my hats safe.
meanings.sent2: The hatboxes in the store were all different colors and sizes.
meanings.sent3: The hatboxes decided to have a race to see who could carry the most hats.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a collection of hatboxes, each holding a different memory.
meanings.sent5: The old hatboxes smelled of lavender and memories of sunny days at the park.

meanings.sent1: She stacked the hatboxes neatly in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: The attic was filled with dusty hatboxes from generations past.
meanings.sent3: The hatboxes gathered for a family reunion, excited to see each other again.
meanings.sent4: The hatboxes lined up on the shelf like soldiers ready for duty.
meanings.sent5: The hatboxes tumbled down the stairs, creating a colorful cascade of hats.
